## Access URLs

## Users & roles

To ensure the security of our services, user names, passwords, and roles are supplied separately. If you do not have this information, please contact[support@validmind.ai](support@validmind.ai) for assistance.

## Prerequisites

In order to access ValidMind from your company network, the following prerequisits apply:
